channel.title: New smart-phone theme
channel.description:
I installed a new theme for smart phones. I have personally tested it with Android 2.0 and it works great. A few others have tested with an iPhone and say it works as well.
I also wrote code to auto-detect and change your theme that currently works with Android and iPhones. If your mobile device supports the new theme, and you want me to auto-detect you, please visit http://www.moparisthebest.com/ip.php and paste me your user-agent.
You can force yourself to use that theme by going to: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?theme=5 And force yourself back by clicking classic, or visiting: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?theme=3
Test posts are acceptable in this thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422850.msg3104026/boardseen.html#new
Thanks for pwnd_ and DansTheMan for helping me test it originally.
Give me feedback on this for things I should change, or how you like it here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,422855.0.html
